M

main(String[]) - Static method in class edu.um.cps2002.tile_game.Launcher
The main method creates a Game instance, runs Game.start() and loops through Game.gameplayRound(), each time executing Game.generateHTMLFiles() to update the maps for each player.
map - Variable in class edu.um.cps2002.tile_game.Game
This GameMap object contains a two-dimensional array of characters storing the tiles of the game (characters representing one of water, grass or treasure).
Map - Class in edu.um.cps2002.tile_game
The Map class contains a two-dimensional array of char entries referred to as tiles and some simple methods common to both the map used by the Game class and the individual Players.
Map(int) - Constructor for class edu.um.cps2002.tile_game.Map
Constructor which initialises the array and sets the attribute Map.size to the parameter size.
move(char) - Method in class edu.um.cps2002.tile_game.Player
This method moves the player (updates the attributes Player.x and Player.y).
moveAllowed(char) - Method in class edu.um.cps2002.tile_game.Player
This method examines the player's current position and determines whether or not it is possible to move in a certain direction, ensuring that the player does not move out of the map.
multiply(int, int) - Method in class edu.um.cps2002.calculator_hello_world.Calculator
